title: team players
body:
just putting this out there for us bronzies.

we all have those games that were people just really dont know what they are doing and no matter how hard you try to talk or explain yourself these people seem to just not care or they afk or throw the game i made it all the way up to b1 promo's and because of these scenarios really starting to think that im wasting my time playing this game, sooo if you are interested in playing to get out off bronze hit me up add.
maybe riot needs to change the way people are put into leagues. thoughts ?????

replies.body: Get me involved pal, Need to get back to Silver at least

I'd be down to play, I can't stand when I have an s+ on Lucian or yasuo and I still end up losing because it's basically a 3v5 with two meat shields that are supposed to be tank but have no tank item cause they're so behind
If you wanna play just add me.
IGN: Prudentia 
I'm on a lot of the days, just message me and tell me it's you and we can play
feel free to drop tips i am more then willing to learn and take on board new ideas cheers.
Pro tip: You have negative KDA in 60% of your ranked games. Work on NOT DYING and you will see the results {{summoner:21}}
ok thanks for the tip i do play alot of support main malp but i see where your coming from thanks any other tips feel free to msge me ty

> maybe riot needs to change the way people are put into leagues. thoughts ?????

**Bronze is made up of the worst players on the server**. Even some of the ones in high bronze/low silver have no idea what they are doing as they got lucky in placements after hitting ranked straight after reaching level 30. Don't sweat too much though, as creating a premade team is the first step to overcoming this barrier and climbing :D
